name: DecentShadows
description:
A design by myself to give Speed Dial a more pleasant appearance.
Influenced from Speed dial - new opera edition (v11.50) by Boxxyf http://userstyles.org/styles/50156/speed-dial-new-opera-edition-v11-50
and Gocom's Estacado start page design which can be found here:
https://gocom.deviantart.com/art/Estacado-start-page-187078857

Special Hint for all esthets: This Wikipedia style by ≤matthias≥ plays perfectly well with DecentShadows:
http://userstyles.org/styles/58965/wikipedia-tribute

Enjoy!
additional_info:
Version 1.01

Changelog:
1.01: Reduced padding to bottom border.

style_setting_options.label: additional background shadow
